name: Hotel Vila Gale Praia

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for the first time at the Vila Gale Praia for 5 nights in May 07 and we had the most perfect relaxing break. The hotel is extremelly well maintained and looks even better in reality than it does on the pictures. In fact it seems that this hotel was designed with great attention to all senses, the way it looks (very stylish), sound (soft music, birds singing throughout, even at the pool), smell (encent), touch (nice quality material in the bedroom) and taste (amazing food at the restaurant!).
reviews.title: Perfect relaxing retreat

likes.liked: — Stylish, great food, nice atmosphere, amazing beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had booked a room with view on the back but we upgraded straight away to a pool view - not because the room wasn't nice but because the pool view is well worth it: better natural + nice balcony overlooking the lovely pool. There was a complimentary basket of fruit and bottle of water in the room. The rooms and the rest of the hotel are very stylish, modern and confortable.
reviews.title: Christmas Sunshine!

reviews.text: The breakfast is very good, good variety of choice and there's even champagne if you fancy.
reviews.title: Chic and Tranquil

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a wonderful 8 nights here from 17th March . All the other reviewers were spot on especially concerning all the staff , they were so friendly and the service was impeccable . A special thanks must go to David the restaurant manager - so professional yet so friendly - no mean feat . It helped that the weather was fantastic 22 degrees and very sunny for most of our stay something we didn't expect for the middle of March . The hotel was modern yet comfortable and the breakfast was brilliant catering for all tastes [ they will cook any eggs to order if you ask ]. I especially liked the great selection of fresh fruit . We found the whole of the Algarve to be a very friendly area and the service in all the bars and restaurants we went to was excellent .The hotel will gladly book you a taxi - only 7 euros to Albufeira old town so no need to drive at that price !
reviews.title: Excellent all round

likes.disliked: — Pool not heated - too cold to swim

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from an absolutely excellent week at the Vila Gale Praia. We chose it on its top tripadvisor ratings and managed to get a room for a week at very short notice. The hotel, the people who work there, the food and the whole atmosphere are outstandingly good and we want to endorse all the favourable comments made about it by other reviewers. NB It is a very quiet and peaceful place and therefore would not be suitable to bring children or teenagers.
reviews.title: Absolutely excellent

reviews.text: we have just returned from a wonderful weeks holiday, I fully recommend this hotel, the staff could not be more helpful, spotless! very stylish a really fantastic holiday, we had wonderful weather all week and made full use of the swimming pool and sun loungers, I can not fault this hotel! from Jane and Stuart from Eastbourne, p.s. we met a wonderful couple from near bluewater, if you are reading this , hope you had a good 2nd week, (from the churchill movers!)
reviews.title: wonderful holiday!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are just back from a very enjoyable stay at the Vila Gale Praia. We had booked our stay completely on the back of tripadvisor ratings and ala in all were not disappointed. We found that the food was excellent, often well above the 4star hotel rating and especially what appears to be the signature dessert dish, Feng Choc - well worth trying! Staff were very friendly and genuine. On arrival you are offered free memebrship of a discount scheme, 10% off everything you put on your tab, but as this appears available to all guests, why not automatically give discount once you sign for a bill to your room? Strange set up but welcome nonetheless. Food was excellent and although we were not on half board we had dinner there 8 out of our 14 nights. Service was very good but on occasions the restaurant was slow when it was only just moderately busy. Thought that it was a little much staying at a lovely hotel and having to pay extra for the tennis but I just read that this is down to the fact that the spa etc is run as a separate business. The hotel should monitor usage and come to some arrangement.
reviews.title: Feng Choc is that good!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For total relaxation this is the place to go, but don't expect a lot of options for dinner. The only alternative we'd recommend is the blue roofed restauant just round the bend from the beach called the Pedras Amarelas. Wonderful fresh fish served plainly but really good and a pleasant change from the sumptuous 3 courses at the hotel.
reviews.title: Exactly what it said on the tin!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On the back of other reviews we decided to try the village of Guia but really, don't bother - the restaurant choices appear very similar, and nothing special and by the time you have managed to get a taxi there and back - good luck in getting one! - you would have had a better, similar priced meal on your doorstep without all the fuss.
reviews.title: Wow!!

likes.liked: — Its style, ambience, wonderful food and peaceful pool area.
